title: My Grandfather's Golden Axe
itunes:title: My Grandfather's Golden Axe
description:
VIDEO GAMES! There are a lot of them out, and we check in with our progress through Horizon and Elden Ring, plus Shadow Warrior 3, Far: Changing Tides, and Destiny 2: The Witch Queen. Also: Epic's Bandcamp acquisition, the words "Fallout: New Vegas 2," a hit list for wrestling talent, and more.

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:10) Intro
(00:00:39) A giant Nextlander Podcast
(00:01:14) Run of show
(00:01:38) Doing side missions in The Banter
(00:02:00) Coming into possession of a CRT
(00:16:31) New Old Stock
(00:20:10) Games
(00:21:01) Horizon Forbidden West [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4] on Feb 18, 2022
(00:39:03) First Break
(00:39:07) [SPOILERS] Horizon Forbidden West
(00:54:46) [END OF HORIZON SPOILERS]
(00:54:51) Elden Ring [PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5] on Feb 25, 2022
(01:09:10) FAR: Changing Tides [PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch] on Mar 01, 2022
(01:13:23) Shadow Warrior 3 [Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Mar 01, 2022
(01:20:11) Destiny 2: The Witch Queen [PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5] on Feb 22, 2022
(01:24:37) Second Break
(01:24:42) News
(01:25:31) EA pulling Russian teams from FIFA and NHL
(01:28:22) Ukraine asks Xbox and PlayStation to end support in Russia
(01:32:11) Epic Games acquires Bandcamp
(01:41:41) First rumors of a Fallout New Vegas 2
(01:44:58) Resident Evil 2, 3, and 7 coming to PS5 and Xbox Series X|S
(01:46:35) Tokyo Game Show is returning
(01:51:44) The state of WWE 2K22
(01:57:33) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:58:25) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts
(02:00:00) Nextlander content updates
(02:01:59) Thanks everyone and see ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
